title: Cumin Turkey Burgers
ingredients: ['1 egg', '2 jalapeno or green chillies, seeded and minced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '4 tablespoons light soy sauce', '4 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '4 tablespoons dried breadcrumbs', '750g minced turkey', '6 hamburger buns or baps, split and toasted']
